solution_line_template: If there are {total_pies} pies of all kinds, and {pies_with_fork_percentage} of all pies are eaten with forks, there are {pies_with_fork_percentage}*{total_pies}= <<{pies_with_fork_percentage}*{total_pies}={pies_eaten_with_forks}>>{pies_eaten_with_forks} pies eaten with forks.
The number of pies that are not eaten with pie is {total_pies}-{pies_eaten_with_forks}=<<{total_pies}-{pies_eaten_with_forks}={pies_not_eaten_with_forks}>>{pies_not_eaten_with_forks}
